STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: local filteredCard = FilteredCard() local objectPlayer = EffectController() return (filteredCard:GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0) and (filteredCard:GetPlayer() == objectPlayer) and (filteredCard ~= nil and filteredCard:GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY)
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_HASTE, 1 ) end end
